reviews.review: This is a videogame. Its not trying to be a specific thing. Its great at a lot of things. Its entertaining.
a classic valve game, a time to the past, nostalgic to others, strange for some, but what do i know, I'm here to beat the shit out of zombies.

I replay every few years and its amazing how many games are still influenced by this. How many similar titles its still better than.

An argument can be made that this is where gaming peaked. This is what a game experience should be. What an era. What a game!

Half-life 2 ist ein Klassiker was man einfach mal gespielt haben muss. Das Spiel ist schon fast 20 Jahre alt, und obwohl es schon viele Jahre aufm Bogel hat macht es immer wieder Spa√ü es zu spielen. Es hat eine recht gute allgemeine Geschichte. Die Grafik ist auch noch recht okay es ist nat√ºrlich nicht mehr Zeitgem√§√ü aber f√ºr sein alter darf es auch schlecht sein. Die Steuerung ist meiner Meinung gut und die Physik im spiel es auch okay. Im ganzen, einkauf lohnt sich immer wieder, und als Tipp noch, man sollte sich auch die Dlc kaufen.

Ultimate Legend. One of the Best Games Ever Made.

Ancestor of the Most Anticipated game in the world. Are you still waiting for Half Life 3? (‚ùÅ¬¥‚ó°`‚ùÅ)

This game is a Masterpiece of Valve and Victor Antonov.

While it's quite old already (even for a "30-year boy" like me) it is still great.
Yes, the graphics is outdated, but don't let it scare you off.

Immercive Orwell 1984-like environment, unprecedented eye for detail and a perfect gameplay balance between shooter/action/puzzles and horror - everything in this game is made with true passion.

I would also like to note that at the moment of it's release (2004) this game was very progressive: live physics, interactive environment, physics based puzzles, advanced face motion, soft body physics, ragdolls, HDR and many other things.
Today these things are common for any AAA-project, but at the time when Half Life 2 release it wasn't that way...

Conclusion:
This game was made by a team of industry leading professionals with a true passion for the product they were creating.
This is a truly rare example of 'how games are meant to be made'. A relic. Don't miss it.

It's Half-Life. Does it really need a review? This game's reputation precedes it. Very fun, with a good balance of challenge and reward. I think that there are some parts of the game that could have been polished a bit more. Then again, it is almost 20 years old. I think it's better made than the first game.

I took bath salts one time along with other drugs i dont remember , i passed out and i was awoken by people calling my name... "freeman" they shouted "freeman!" one shouted with such anger . my eyes opened and i didnt recognize where i was, what happened to the 7-11 i was getting high behind? i look around and i see a middle aged bald scientist in a white lab coat and he looked at me like i was a ghost. " whats half life 3 ?" he asked with such horror in his voice i slapped my face thinking holy shit that wasnt bath salts i snorted . so 10/drugs i would recommend playing
please make episode 3. these games are absolutely amazing.

Definitiv einer der schlechtesten Shooter, die ich je gespielt habe. Einfach nur extrem langweilig. Keiner der Charakter war auch nur ann√§hernd interessant und das Gameplay macht einfach kein Spa√ü. Die Standard-Pistole h√∂rt und f√ºhlt sich schlecht an. Das Brecheisen ist die langweiligste Nahkampfwaffe, die ich je hatte. (Die beste war die Rohrzange aus Bioshock) Die Physik, die zu Release nat√ºrlich was neues und extrem geiles war, ist zumindest heute eine Tortur. Man bleibt √ºberall h√§ngen und Gegenst√§nde buggen rum, wenn man ihnen zu Nahe kommt. Ragdoll der Gegner ist √ºbertrieben. Die Story ist extrem langweilig und schlecht erz√§hlt. Alle 30 Sekunden die Waffe zu wechseln, um eine Munitionskiste zu √∂ffnen, nervt extrem. 
Zu Release war das Spiel nat√ºrlich seiner Zeit weit voraus und hat vielen anderen Spielen die Richtung vorgegeben. Trotzdem ist es meiner Meinung nach kein gutes Spiel. 
Den einzigen Spa√ü, den ich hatte, war das Kapitel, in dem man die Ameisenl√∂wen hatte. War geil anzusehen.
